channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report X-2025021225
item.description:
Report X-2025021225

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-01T21:20:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-17
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED AT THE BOTTOM OF BLACK AT CLERK STATION. THE PACKAGE HAD ORIENTATION ARROWS. IT WAS BROUGHT BACK TO THE DMP AND WAS DISCOVERED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. HAZMAT HELPDESK WAS CALLED.
